summary: An imaginary return of dictator Ceausescu after 20 years of capitalism in his country, Romania, where he finds a new society but also old habits in the country's businessmen.
cast: George Becali|George Copos|Dan Diaconescu|Ioan Niculae|George Padure|Dinu Patriciu|Florin Alexandru Stan|Dan Voiculescu
title: Kapitalism - Reteta noastra secreta
